portfolio.desc: A curated selection of our latest high-performance digital solutions. Quality over quantity.

hero.title: AI Chatbot Solutions
hero.lead: Smart customer service automation and lead generation.
hero.h2: The Future of Automated Customer Engagement
hero.p1: Integrate cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence into your business to provide instant, personalized responses 24/7. Optimize workflows and free up your team for high-impact strategic tasks.

hero.title: Digital Marketing Agency
hero.lead: Data-driven strategies to boost traffic and conversion rates.
hero.p1: We design and execute performance-based digital marketing campaigns: SEO, SEM, and Social Media Marketing. We manage Google Ads and Meta Ads, optimizing CTR, CPC, and ROI for your business in Bolivia and beyond.

hero.title: Professional SEO Services
hero.lead: Enhance your search engine visibility and organic reach.
hero.h2: Rank Higher Where Your Customers Are
hero.p1: 90% of online experiences begin with a search engine. We optimize your site for Google's latest algorithms: Technical SEO (crawling, indexing, Core Web Vitals), On-page SEO (semantic tags, content optimization), and Off-page SEO (link building and authority). Drive high-quality organic traffic without the cost-per-click, focusing on Santa Cruz and global markets.
hero.p2: We complement our strategy with digital marketing and CTR optimization through structured data and rich snippets to dominate search results.

hero.title: Full-Stack Web Development
hero.lead: Custom-built, high-performance websites optimized for growth.
hero.p1: We build websites that don't just look stunning—they rank and convert. Utilizing Astro, React, and Tailwind CSS, we maximize Core Web Vitals, technical SEO, and accessibility. We implement semantic HTML and rich snippets tailored for the Bolivian and international markets.
hero.p2: Our development includes on-page SEO, strategic information architecture, and internal linking to rank for keywords like 'web development in Santa Cruz' and 'top web agency in Bolivia'.

hero.title: Mobile App Development
hero.lead: Custom mobile and web applications tailored to your needs.
hero.h2: Innovation in the Palm of Your Hand
hero.p1: We transform your ideas into powerful mobile and web apps using React Native and Flutter, prioritizing performance, user experience (UX), and scalability. We integrate real-time analytics and push notifications for friction-less growth.
hero.li1: Native & Hybrid App Development (React Native, Flutter)

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.lead: At Ganex, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.lead: Welcome to Ganex. By accessing our website and using our services, you agree to comply with the following Terms of Service.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By browsing our site or using our services, you confirm that you have read and accepted these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our platform.

sections.title: 2. Proper Use of Services
sections.content: You agree to use our services responsibly and legally. Specifically, you will not:
list: Violate local, national, or international laws.
Distribute illegal, offensive, or fraudulent content.
Attempt unauthorized access to our systems or networks.
sections.extra: We reserve the right to suspend access if misuse is detected.

sections.title: 3. Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content on this site—including text, images, designs, and code—is the exclusive property of Ganex and is protected by intellectual property laws.
sections.extra: Reproduction or distribution without express written consent is prohibited.

sections.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: We strive for excellence, but Ganex does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service.
sections.extra: To the extent permitted by law, we are not liable for direct or indirect damages arising from the use of our services.

sections.title: 5. Third-Party Links
sections.content: Our site may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their content or privacy practices.

sections.title: 6. Modifications
sections.content: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Changes are effective upon publication.

sections.title: 7. Contact Information
sections.content: If you have questions regarding these terms, please contact us.
